name: SizeSummary
description: type interface that can be used to summarize multiple files

numberOfFiles.description: if this is about multiple files, the number of files is specified here

linesPerFile.description: rounded, amount of lines per file (averaged)

charactersPerfLine.description: rounded, amount of characters per line (averaged)

bytesPerCharacter.description: rounded, amount of bytes per character

typeDefinition.description: type interface that can be used to summarize multiple files

simplifiedSchema.description: type interface that can be used to summarize multiple files

schema.description: if this is about multiple files, the number of files is specified here
amount of characters
amount of lines
amount of bytes
rounded, amount of lines per file (averaged)
rounded, amount of characters per line (averaged)
rounded, amount of bytes per character

name: FolderSummary
description:
objective size measurements of all files in a folder

summary for a folder should contain file-summaries for different filetypes and an overal file summary

typeDefinition.description:
objective size measurements of all files in a folder

summary for a folder should contain file-summaries for different filetypes and an overal file summary

simplifiedSchema.description:
objective size measurements of all files in a folder

summary for a folder should contain file-summaries for different filetypes and an overal file summary

schema.description: type interface that can be used to summarize multiple files
if this is about multiple files, the number of files is specified here

amount of lines
amount of bytes
rounded, amount of lines per file (averaged)
rounded, amount of characters per line (averaged)
rounded, amount of bytes per character
